nodes.text: Wesson Dove was a female individual who served as pilot of the New Republic's Phantom Squadron during the Galactic Civil War. Sometime before the Battle of Crait, Dove married to Raidah Doon and established on Mygeeto where they worked as long haul cargo pilots. Dove and her wife joined the Resistance and participated on a mission to the planet Bracca.
Wesson Dove first appeared in the 2019 novel Resistance Reborn, written by Rebecca Roanhorse.
